hangle: 황태자가 불법 투기장에서 잡혔다는 소식은 순식간에 퍼져나갔다.
first_translate: the news that  the crown prince was caught at an illegal arena spread like wildfire.
everyone from all corners of high society whispered amongst themselves about his scandalous behavior.

hangle: 이 소식을 들은 황제는 길길이 날뛰었다.
first_translate: and when the emperor heard this news, he flew into a rage.
enoch!!!
this is absolutely humiliating for our family!
how dare you bring shame upon the imperial name?!
f-father! I--

hangle: 전 시그렌 그놈의 함정에 빠진 것입니다!
first_translate: I fell prey to one of siegren’s traps...!
silence!
you fool!

hangle: 황자는 황족으로서 불법 투기장을 단속했을 뿐이다.
first_translate: his highness merely went undercover as part of efforts to crack down on these arenas.

hangle: 거기다 클로비스 후작과 힘을 합쳐 국고를 채우는 데 도움까지 주었지!
first_translate: in fact, by joining forces with marquess clovis, we were able to fill up the national treasury!
now everyone praises him even more than before!
b-but father--
get out of my sight.

hangle: 당분간 사교계 출입을 엄금하고, 네 성에서 근신하거라!
first_translate: for now, stay away from high society and remain confined within your palace walls!
it's because of that bastard...
I'll kill him...
mark my words...
thank you so much, lady fiona.
all thanks to you, I could reject the proposal letter.
no need to thank me. after all, it was only possible due to what happened last time.
lady livia really is too humble sometimes.
after the incident at the arena,

hangle: 황태자는 불법 투기장에서 부린 추태가 알려져 근신 처분을 받게 되었다.
first_translate: prince enoch received disciplinary action for disgracing himself there.
why did things have to turn out this way...?!

hangle: 덕분에 리비아는 큰 문제 없이 청혼서를 거절할 수 있게 되었지.
first_translate: as such, livia was able to decline the marriage offer without any issues.

hangle: 사교계에서는 리비아에 대한 동정론까지 돌고 있다니까.
first_translate: rumors say people feel sorry for her nowadays.

hangle: 당분간은 가여운 영애 노릇을 좀 해볼까요.
first_translate: let's play along with being pitied for a while longer then.
that girl has quite the carefree personality...
arendt also seems very satisfied.

hangle: 하긴 그 많은 귀족에게서 재산을 뜯어냈으니.
first_translate: well, they managed to get their hands on money from those nobles.
we’re grateful for everything you’ve done, my lady.
with this amount, we won’t have to worry about finances anymore.
my lady, how do you feel about recent events?
pardon? why would you ask that?

hangle: 그 일 이후로 황자 전하의 인기가 더욱 올라갔잖아요.
first_translate: didn’t you hear? ever since then, his highness became even more popular among the ladies.
look over there right now...

hangle: 두 분께서는 교제 중이신 것 같은데, 괜찮으신가요?
first_translate: from what I see, it looks like both of you are seeing each other. does that not bother you?
uh...
not particularly...?
good heavens...
what a generous soul she must be...
siegren.

hangle: 그 ‘문어 다리 걸친 연인에게 첫사랑이 농락당한 젊은이의 얼굴’은 뭐야?
first_translate: so tell me, what exactly is “the face of a young man whose first love cheated on them” look like?

hangle: 저기, 방금까지 예쁜 아가씨들 사이에 있던 건 너거든?
first_translate: hey, weren’t you just surrounded by pretty girls earlier?
if anyone deserves to make that expression, it’s me.
yet here you are, looking completely fine.
argh...

hangle: 나라고 뭐 마음 편하기만 한 줄 아나.
first_translate: do you think I’m happy about this situation either?

hangle: 애도 아니고 일일이 질투할 순 없으니까 그렇지.
first_translate: I'm trying hard not to act childish and jealous.
anyway,
has abel contacted us yet?
oh yeah, I got a reply yesterday.
dear fiona,

hangle: 죽음을 조사한다니, 아무리 너라도 힘들 것 같구나.
first_translate: to investigate death itself will prove difficult, even for someone like yourself.

hangle: 헤일론의 일이 바빠져서 당분간 돌아갈 수 없을 것 같다.
first_translate: things seem busy back home, so I don’t know if I’ll return anytime soon.
I won’t stop you from doing whatever you want,

hangle: 대신 죽은 땅에서 도움이 될 만한 똥개를 하나 보내마.
first_translate: but instead, I’ll send you a watchdog that might help you during your journey through dead lands.
a watchdog...
I still don’t understand what he meant by that though...

hangle: 그보다 놀라운 게 다음 줄에 쓰여 있지 뭐야.
first_translate: but anyway, the next line shocked me even further.
additionally,
nicely done regarding the matter with the arena.
I couldn’t be prouder of you.
I wish he’d come sooner.
is miss fiona missing her teacher already?

hangle: …아벨이 있어야 네 근처에 이상한 놈들이 안 오지.
first_translate: abel needs to hurry back so weirdos quit bothering you.
true enough.

hangle: 아무튼 투기장 일은 이렇게 잘 끝났고…
first_translate: at least the whole mess involving the arena ended well...
I thought life would go smoothly for some time,
but what in the world is going on now?

hangle: 전 리비아 영애에게 볼일이 있는 게 아닙니다만?
first_translate: I didn’t mean to intrude on you, but may I speak with lady livia?
no, please leave.
lady fiona is busy.
i-it’s alright, lady livia.

hangle: 그리고 지금 도망쳐봤자 후작은 어떻게든 다시 찾아올걸요…
first_translate: running away isn’t gonna solve anything. besides, lord clovis will find another chance to meet you again...
then...
be careful, my lady.
alright.
I shall cut straight to the point.
tell me, are you human or not?

hangle: 사실 저는 어둠과 관련된 문제로 영애의 정체를 의심하고 있습니다.
first_translate: truthfully speaking, I suspect you aren’t based on certain connections related to darkness.
what?

hangle: 왜 갑자기 어둠과의 상관관계를 따지는 거지?
first_translate: why suddenly mention darkness?
there’s nothing else to discuss, huh?

hangle: 제게 왜 그런 질문을 하시는지 모르겠는데요.
first_translate: I fail to grasp the reason behind your question.

hangle: 의심하고 있는 상대에게 이유를 말할 수는 없겠죠.
first_translate: of course, I wouldn’t explain myself to someone I distrust.
I suppose your silence answers my suspicions.
wait,
hold on, pal!
if my questions offended you, I apologize.
that wasn’t my intention, so please forgive me--
just what...

hangle: 내가 진짜 피오나가 아니라는 걸 알게 된 건가?
first_translate: does he realize I’m actually not fiona?
but how did he figure that out?

hangle: 답 안 나올걸 생각해봤자 어쩔 수 없어.
first_translate: no use worrying about something unsolvable.
time to focus on work.
I knew official documents would arrive eventually,
but talk about perfect timing.
still, the situation turned out worse than expected...
recently, new areas of land died off.
the scale is several times larger compared to previous incidents.

hangle: 게다가 일부는 마을이었던 터라 인명 피해까지 났다...
first_translate: on top of that, villages suffered damage resulting in loss of lives...

hangle: 심지어 영지 주변에 광폭화된 마물이 많아져 다른 영지도 애를 먹고 있음…
first_translate: also, many monsters near the borderlands ran amok causing problems for neighboring territories...
seriously?
since the request came directly from the imperial family, we cannot refuse.

hangle: 이렇게 된 거 열심히 해서 사람들을 돕자.
first_translate: seeing as matters reached this far, let’s put forth our best effort to aid others.

hangle: 유니스도 오는 것 같던데 창조주로서 모범을 보여야지.
first_translate: apparently, eunice plans to join as well. as creator, I better set a good example.
excuse me, my lady.
I hope I haven’t disturbed you.
it’s okay. what brings you here?
an unknown guest arrived claiming to be a messenger,

hangle: 아무래도 아가씨가 구분을 해주셔야 될 것 같습니다.
first_translate: but perhaps you should decide whether he truly is one or not.
what?
he says he brought a message from duke bernhart.
from the duke?
“if unsure, consult siegren.”
what kind of nonsense is this...?
make sure to inform the royal palace about the visitor.
right away.
who could it possibly be...?
huh?
hm.
are you fiona haelion?
who are you?!
